titleStmt.title: The tryal and process of high-treason and doom of forfaulture against Mr. Robert Baillie of Jerviswood traitor by His Majesties special command ...
titleStmt.author: Mackenzie, George, Sir, 1636-1691.
Baillie, Robert, d. 1684.
England and Wales. Privy Council.
